title: Smart Data Models - WindDynamicsLookupTable
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class models a look up table for the purpose of wind standard models.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindDynamicsLookupTable

WindContCurrLimIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The wind dynamics lookup table associated with this current control limitation model. Default: None

WindContPType3IEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The wind dynamics lookup table associated with this P control type 3 model. Default: None

WindContRotorRIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The rotor resistance control model with which this wind dynamics lookup table is associated. Default: None

WindPlantFreqPcontrolIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The wind dynamics lookup table associated with this frequency and active power wind plant model. Default: None

input.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Input value (x) for the lookup table function. Default: 0.0

lookupTableFunctionType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Type of the lookup table function. Default: None

output.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Output value (y) for the lookup table function. Default: 0.0

sequence.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Sequence numbers of the pairs of the input (x) and the output (y) of the lookup table function. Default: 0
